description: Post-launch sprint backlog focused on monetization reliability and self-serve growth.

epics.Description: Harden checkout/portal/webhook behavior and observability so paid conversion is production-safe.
Reduce time-to-first-settlement with guided bootstrap and first-run automation.
Operationalize dispute and arbitration workflows with queue-first operator tooling.
Expose policy presets, staged rollouts, and rollback controls for tenant operators.
Productionize periodic reconciliation, mismatch triage, and finance-grade exports.
Launch the first deterministic capability listing and RFQ/bid/accept marketplace loop.

tickets.Summary: Add Stripe provider failure reason telemetry
tickets.Description: Capture structured billing provider failure reasons in reconcile reporting and ops audit records.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Reconcile report returns rejectedReasonCounts with deterministic reason keys

tickets.Description: Document and script fast replay and reconciliation for dropped Stripe webhook windows.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Runbook includes reproducible command set and on-call validation checklist

tickets.Summary: Enforce billing smoke in release gate
tickets.Description: Run production-like billing smoke in CI against staging env with pass/fail artifact output.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Deploy is blocked when billing smoke fails

tickets.Description: Create endpoint that provisions tenant defaults, ops scopes, and starter policy bundle.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: New tenant can execute first verified settlement without manual DB edits

tickets.Description: Add a checklist flow in dashboard to create API key, run first verification, and confirm settlement.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Median time-to-first-settlement is under 15 minutes for test users

tickets.Description: Track signup, key generation, first run, first verification, and first settlement conversion.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Dashboard exposes step conversion and drop-off percentages by tenant cohort

tickets.Description: Add queue status, SLA age, priority, and assignee filters for arbitration cases.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Queue endpoints support deterministic sorting and pagination under load

tickets.Description: Create queue + case detail UI with evidence timeline and ruling actions.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Operator can resolve a case end-to-end with audit trail persisted

tickets.Description: Trigger alerts when arbitration cases exceed defined age thresholds.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Alerts fire for overdue cases and include direct case identifiers

tickets.Description: Persist policy bundle versions and enforce immutable historical references on runs.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Every run references an immutable policy version id and hash

tickets.Description: Support draft/canary/active policy stages with tenant-level rollout percentages.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Canary rollout can be activated and rolled back without data migration

tickets.Description: Expose policy versions, diffs, stage transitions, and rollback actions in dashboard.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Operator can view and safely roll back to prior policy from UI

tickets.Description: Create periodic reconciliation jobs with tenant-aware windows and retention policies.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Each tenant receives a daily reconciliation artifact without manual trigger

tickets.Description: Add mismatch classification, owner assignment, and resolution actions.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Mismatch records are stateful and idempotent under repeated actions

tickets.Description: Expose mismatch queue and export actions in operator dashboard.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Finance operator can close reconciliation cycle and export evidence bundle

tickets.Summary: Add capability listing object and API
tickets.Description: Create canonical capability listing records with pricing, SLA, and availability metadata.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Listings can be created, queried, and versioned deterministically

tickets.Summary: Implement RFQ and bid submission endpoints
tickets.Description: Support request-for-quote creation and bid submissions tied to listed capabilities.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: RFQ to accepted bid path is fully auditable and idempotent

tickets.Description: Create list/search/rfq/bid acceptance surfaces for first beta marketplace tenants.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Beta users can discover, bid, and accept work from the UI with settlement linkage
